statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_data;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, satisfaction_score FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 50;
SELECT customer_name, date_received FROM customer_feedback_data ORDER BY date_received DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, satisfaction_score FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT customer_name, date_received, satisfaction_score FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY date_received DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_data ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC, customer_name ASC
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%positive%' AND satisfaction_score BETWEEN 4 AND 5
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM customer_feedback_data GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_feedbacks > 2 ORDER BY total_feedbacks DESC
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE date_received >= '2023-01-01' AND feedback_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, timestamp FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, risk_description, risk_level FROM reputation_risks;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, timestamp FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedbacks > 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-03-31' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT r.risk_id, r.risk_description, c.feedback_text FROM reputation_risks r INNER JOIN customer_feedback c ON r.feedback_id = c.feedback_id ORDER BY r.risk_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, category FROM FeedbackAnalysis ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT sentiment_score, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT feedback_id, analysis_result FROM FeedbackAnalysis WHERE category='Customer Service';
SELECT id, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT category, analysis_result FROM FeedbackAnalysis WHERE category = 'Service' OR category = 'Product';
SELECT feedback_id, category, analysis_result FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN FeedbackAnalysis ON CustomerFeedback.id = FeedbackAnalysis.feedback_id;
SELECT id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%excellent%';
SELECT risk_id, risk_level FROM ReputationRisk WHERE risk_level != 'Low' ORDER BY risk_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone, customer_email FROM customer ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT risk_description, risk_category FROM reputation_risks WHERE risk_status = 'Active';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM feedback_sentiment ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT risk_description FROM reputation_risks WHERE risk_status = 'Open';
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback JOIN feedback_sentiment ON customer_feedback.feedback_id = feedback_sentiment.feedback_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, timestamp FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT rating_id, satisfaction_level FROM ratings ORDER BY reliability_level DESC;
SELECT tag_name FROM tags JOIN feedback_tags ON tags.tag_id = feedback_tags.tag_id WHERE feedback_tags.feedback_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, timestamp FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, satisfaction_level FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id JOIN ratings ON feedback.feedback_id = ratings.feedback_id;

SELECT customers.customer_name, tags.tag_name FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id JOIN feedback_tags ON feedback.feedback_id = feedback_tags.feedback_id JOIN tags ON feedback_tags.tag_id = tags.tag_id;
